thread.title: Kris Jenner wishes Rob Kardashian happy birthday with some adorable throwback family photos
thread.title_full: Kris Jenner wishes Rob Kardashian happy birthday with some adorable throwback family photos

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Kris Jenner wishes Rob Kardashian happy birthday with some adorable throwback family photos
text:
Kris Jenner wishes Rob Kardashian happy birthday with some adorable throwback family photos She said her son has the "sweetest soul and the kindest heart" Share Kris Jenner and Rob Kardashian (Photo: Instagram/Getty) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kris Jenner has wished Rob Kardashian the very best on his 30th birthday - and said she's "blessed" to have him as her son. 
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians matriarch shared a very touching message to celebrate the milestone age, and revealed her pride at the man her boy has become. 
Alongside the note, she shared a collage of snaps of Rob over the years, from family snaps of him growing up to a more recent picture of the pair sat together as she cuddled his daughter Dream. Kris Jenner wishes Rob Kardashian a happy birthday (Photo: krisjenner/Instagram) 
"Happy birthday @robkardashian!!!!," she wrote. "I love you more than words can say. You have the sweetest soul and the kindest heart, and I am blessed beyond measure to call you my son. Read More 
"I am so proud of the man you have become and it brings me so much joy to watch you grow as a brother, son and father. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
